tool_description: This API is running with Python Flash server and it is fast. You can use this API as QR code generator api. All you have to do, is to send a request  with the URL you want, and immediently get the QR code Image in response.
name: QR Code generator API
title: QR Code generator API

api_list.name: QR Code Image_copy
api_list.description: This end point takes a 'GET' request with url / string as a parameter and returns qr code image
